title: Kelvingrove Park Local Trail
description: The trail starts at Kelvingrove Museum and takes about 90 minutes

stops.title: Park Gardens Staircase
stops.intro:
![Park Gardens Staircase](park-gardens-staircase.jpg)

The staircase was built from grey Bonawe granite from Argyll in 1853-4.
